settings.title: Almonds
settings.text: These power-packed nuts have healthy fats, fiber, protein, magnesium and vitamin E. Plus, raw and roasted almonds are prebiotic and support the gut microbiome.

settings.title: Hazelnuts
settings.text: Delicious and nutritious! Hazelnuts’ high level of vitamin E make them powerful cancer-fighting foods, boost the brain, and contribute to healthy skin and hair.

settings.title: Coconuts
settings.text: Sulfate-free coconut contains many disease fighting properties. It has many beneficial effects on cholesterol levels, bone health, and blood sugar control.

settings.title: Pistachios
settings.text: Filled with vitamin B6, pistachios help maintain a healthy nervous and immune system. They also lower cholesterol and support gut, eye, and blood vessel health.

settings.title: Dates
settings.text: By weight, dates contain 50% more potassium than bananas. One of seven essential macrominerals – potassium helps send nerve signals and regulate fluid balance.

settings.title: Cocoa
settings.text: Cocoa is packed with polyphenols, a naturally occurring antioxidant, known to improve blood flow and supply to your brain, neuron creation, and brain function.

settings.title: Sea Salt
settings.text: Sea salt is natural source of sodium loaded with electrolytes. Sea salt nourishes adrenal glands, improves dental health, and prmotes Nutrient Absorption.

settings.ss1-text: I created nomz with a simple goal: to help people live happier, healthy lives.
settings.middle-text1: Anytime I craved something sweet, I reached for these energy bites. They completely satisfied my desire. Eliminating refined sugars became easy with these by my side. I had more energy, more clarity, and slept better. I was much happier.
settings.middle-text2: I spent the summer months that year on the Moose Cree Indigenous Reserve in Northern Ontario. I tried my best to eat healthy, but food insecurity was, and still is an issue.
settings.middle-text3: When I came home, I started falling back into my old ways of eating candy and chocolate bars. So, I mixed up a batch of these bites, and took them to my family’s home to try.
settings.middle-text4: My mom loved them so much that she suggested I start selling them. My brother helped come up with the name “nomz”, and a month later, local retailers started carrying it in their stores.
settings.grant-text1: My time with the Moose Cree Indigenous community transformed me. It also fueled the company’s mission to help people eat and live better, across Canada and beyond.
settings.grant-text2: The annual nomz grant provides funding for an Indigenous individual to pursue their dreams to start or grow their own business. As we grow, so does our ability to give back.
settings.ingredient-section-head: What you put in your body is important.
settings.ingredient-section-text: That’s why we’re committed to quality ingredients and why “delicious” is our true north star.
